activities: Eurofins Central Laboratory, LLC supports clinical trial analytical work. In coordination with pharmaceutical sponsors and CROs (Central Research Organizations), Eurofins receives minimum personnel information to support clinical trial studies such as initials, gender, and/or date of birth.
contacttitle1: VP & GM US & Global Lab Ops
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Eurofins Central Laboratory generates clinical trial data including patient demographics and reports. This data is processed manually and via automated systems.
